title: Try File Storage for free!
description: Need shared storage for your clusters or instances? Our fully managed File Storage for Public Cloud solution offers NFS volumes ranging from 150 GiB to 10 GiB, up to 16,000 IOPS and 128 MB/s. It works with Managed Kubernetes (PVCs RWX) and Public Cloud instances (NFS mounts), allowing transparent file sharing across nodes, zones, and applications – all with clear pricing.
